page.title: 01 CHANGES IN SHIPPON
page.content: Shippon has not really changed since 1975 but has changed alot since 1905.In this time the TRANSPORT has changed from horse and cart to modern cars. The R.A.F.is another recent change to Shippon .It has brought jobs and new houses.As well as houses coming to Shippon houses have gone as well from the surrounding fields. The oldest building is the church.BARROW ROAD,which passes through the village,used to have a spring on it.People came to dab the water on their eyes to heal them. One house in the village was built by a former PRINCE OF WALES after a ten year legal battle with the local farmer who owned the land. (Andrew Dominic,Chris Naisby,James Payne and Michael Clark)
